item.title: The Case for Dual Monitors by a Stubborn Developer
item.description:
Like many developers, the main machine that I code on has always been a laptop. Previously, it was a 15.6" HP EliteBook 850 G8. Most recently it has been a 14" Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5.

I am quite stubborn with introducing any additions to my workflow and setups for a number of reasons but it mainly boils down to the following mentality I have developed:

Reducing the number of dependencies both software and hardware.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Sphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.
